title: Total Sales
description:
📈 Summary: Your business earned $338,858.50, which shows good income.

🔍 Observations:
- The total money you made is a healthy amount.
- This number alone doesn’t say if this is more or less than before.
- It’s important to compare this with past months to see growth or decline.

✅ Recommendation: Try to track your earnings each month so you can spot if business is improving or needs attention.

title: Ranking
description:
📈 Summary: Your fried chicken business is doing very well and is ranked #1 in its category.

🔍 Observations:
- The fried chicken part of your business holds the top spot in its category.
- The side dishes are ranked 26th, showing they are less popular compared to fried chicken.
- This means most customers likely come for your fried chicken items.

✅ Recommendation: Focus on promoting your fried chicken since it’s your strongest point, and consider improving or marketing your side dishes more to boost their sales.

title: Transport
description:
📈 Summary: Delivery times average around 38.5 minutes from order to customer, which is reasonable but could be improved.

🔍 Observations:
- It takes about 12.5 minutes on average for the driver to arrive after the order is placed.
- Then around 6 minutes for food pickup after arrival.
- The delivery from pickup to customer takes about 20 minutes.
- Together, these add up to just over 38 minutes total delivery time.

✅ Recommendation: Look for ways to speed up driver arrival or food pickup to reduce total delivery time and make customers happier.

title: Market Price
description:
📈 Summary: Your prices are slightly higher than the average for your cuisine.

🔍 Observations:
- Your price range is between $3.00 and $9.17.
- The average price for this cuisine is a bit lower, around $2.84 to $8.39.
- Your prices are about 7.45% higher than the average.
- This might mean customers see your food as more premium or you could be charging a bit more than other places.

✅ Recommendation: Keep an eye on customer feedback to see if the higher prices are okay for them, or consider small discounts or combos to attract more buyers.
